definition: A bishop's seat or see. BISHOP'S-WEED Bish"op's-weed`, n. (Bot.) (a) An umbelliferous plant of the genus Ammi. (b) Goutweed (Ã†gopodium podagraria). BISHOP'S-WORT Bish"op's-wort`, n.
